plugins\/scan_ip\/desktop\/php\/scan_ip..Attention Widget dédié au plugin: Warning: Dedicated widget for the plugin

plugins\/scan_ip\/desktop\/php\/scan_ip..Activer la commande WoL sur cet équipeme: Enable WoL command on this device

plugins\/scan_ip\/desktop\/modal\/networ.Les plages ip et adresses MAC du réseau: IP ranges and MAC addresses of the network

plugins\/scan_ip\/desktop\/modal\/yes_eq.Pour le moment, vous n'avez pas enregist: You haven't registered any MAC devices yet.

plugins\/scan_ip\/plugin_info\/configura.Permet d'afficher le widget des %s derni: Allows displaying the widget of the %s latest devices entering your network
plugins\/scan_ip\/plugin_info\/configura.Afficher le widget des %s derniers équip: Display the widget of the %s latest unregistered devices in the network
plugins\/scan_ip\/plugin_info\/configura.Masquer le widget des %s derniers équipe: Hide the widget of the %s latest unregistered devices in the network
plugins\/scan_ip\/plugin_info\/configura.Retirer le routeur de la liste: Remove the router from the list
plugins\/scan_ip\/plugin_info\/configura.Ajouter le routeur dans la liste: Add the router to the list
plugins\/scan_ip\/plugin_info\/configura.Nombre d'essaie lors des scans (Mode ava: Number of attempts during scans (Advanced Mode)
plugins\/scan_ip\/plugin_info\/configura.Cela conditionne la durée du scan mais p: This conditions the duration of the scan but provides better results in exploring your network
plugins\/scan_ip\/plugin_info\/configura.Option à n'activer que si vous utilisez: Option to activate only if you use Safari
plugins\/scan_ip\/plugin_info\/configura.Pour désactiver les options du menu de s: To disable the options of the selection menu for already associated bridges. (On other browsers, the data is hidden)
plugins\/scan_ip\/plugin_info\/configura.Ce fichier sert à récupérer le nom des c: This file is used to retrieve the name of hardware manufacturers
plugins\/scan_ip\/plugin_info\/configura.Il est recommandé de laisser ce paramètr: It is recommended to leave this parameter at %s minute(s)

plugins\/scan_ip\/desktop\/js\/scan_ip_e.Attention, cet équipement est associé %s: Warning, this equipment is associated %s times with the plugin %s.
plugins\/scan_ip\/desktop\/js\/scan_ip_e.Il est possible que cela génère des conf: It is possible that this may cause conflicts if it is a mistake on your part.
plugins\/scan_ip\/desktop\/js\/scan_ip_e.Attention, cet équipement est associé au:
Warning, this equipment is associated with the core bridge of your Jeedom!
This means that Scan.Ip can modify your Jeedom configuration.
This association is intended for advanced users as it may cause errors in your global configuration or affect the proper functioning of other plugins.

plugins\/scan_ip\/core\/class\/scan_ip.b.Aucun élément compatible n'est associé a: No compatible elements are associated with the bridges.

plugins\/scan_ip\/core\/class\/scan_ip.w.Cet équipement est enregistré mais désac: This device is registered but disabled

plugins\/scan_ip\/core\/class\/scan_ip.s.Incident de mise à jour Scan.Ip : Synchr: Scan.Ip update incident: Synchronization canceled because the data is not in the format of the installed version. Go to the plugin settings and activate debug mode to fix the issue.
